short_summary: Provide technical writing services for a project related to building science.
description: Natural Resources Canada has a requirement for the provision of a technical writer to provide building science technical advice, develop procedures integrating practical experience, process exceptions files, carry out research, tests and analyzes, edit and create technical documentation.
full_summary:
================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### **3.10 Technical Writer - Intermediate**

**Reference Number:** cb-4452-85863429

**Publication Date:** 2023-03-27

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-03T14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

**Procurement Category:** SRV

### **Summary**

Natural Resources Canada is seeking a highly skilled Technical Writer to provide technical advice and documentation services. The selected individual will work closely with the organization's building science team to develop technical procedures, edit and create documentation, and conduct research and testing.

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Provide building science technical advice
* Develop procedures integrating practical experience
* Process exceptions files
* Carry out research, tests, and analyses
* Edit and create technical documentation

### **Delivery Locations**

The successful bidder will be required to deliver services in the following locations:

* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Ottawa

### **Term and Duration**

The contract is expected to commence on 2023-05-15 and conclude on 2024-05-14. The term is for approximately one year.

### **Trading Agreements**

This contract is open to bidders who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### **Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

Marie-Josée Michaud
Email: [marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
Phone: (418) 563-6916

### **Tender Documents**

The tender document can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4452/nrcan-5000072101---tsps---3.10---technical-writer
